Name: Black Lotus Motel
About the game: WELCOME TO BLACK LOTUS MOTEL. A 2 player co-op survival experience that puts you and a friend to a bonding test in which cooperation will be the main mechanic. Connect with a friend in this first-person fast-paced escape simulator. Key Features: - 2 Player ONLINE CO-OP: Play online with a friend that owns the game over the internet. Create a room and pass on the details for she/him to join. - First Person Controller: Move with WASD, jump with SPACE bar, crouch with C, and sprint with SHIFT. Enhance these attributes from the POWER-UP station! - Bottle Shooting Mechanic: Drink and throw Macabra bottles. Don't drink too much or your camera will get pixelated! - 16 Cooperative Challenges: Join forces with a teammate to complete a series of co-op puzzles needed to move forward in your game progression! - Time is key in this game. The game will be over after an hour and a half or it can be beaten with a 25-minute speedrun, you set the pace. - Toxic tide: You have 72 hours to beat the game. The tide will rise at dawn and lower at dusk. - Passwords: Go on a password hunt around the level map and unlock all 3 keys to access different areas of the Motel! - Achievements: There are 20 achievements to unlock! Will you be able to get the World Record? - Guide: For beginners, here's a guide that will hint you in every direction --> READ ME > Remember I'm a solo dev! Come share your experience on so you can help me improve the game :) THANK YOU FOR PLAYING AND HAVE A NICE STAY!
